Had to install FB Lite to see if the things I posted went through because sometimes some error causes the post to be non-editable (if there's such a word). Also Lite is lower in resource impact when using the messenger feature since it is geared towards regions with limited access to 3G/4G/LTE networks. If the current Messenger has those same resource lite features, I'm all for it. Otherwise, it would be great if the Facebook app could auto-integrate with similar apps to streamline messaging.

I hate how the app updates itself whenever it likes, even though auto-updates are turned off on Google Play. Some phones have the option built into the app to disable the updates but many, like mine, don't. Facebook need to allow the user to choose whether they want auto-update or not rather than forcing it on us.
